commit.message:
Add unit tests (#3779)

* Add countTrailingNullValues unit test

* Fix countTrailingNullValues

* Add test for trimNullValues

* Add test coverage reporter

* Improve useMapCountryToColor test coverage

* Improve replaceVariablesInText test suite

* Add tests for adjustDataToLastAccurateValue and createDate

* Add more unit tests

* Move helper to context

* Move helper to back to utils

* Add tests for CurrentDateContext

* Add tests for getBoundaryDateStartUnix

* Start work on getVrForMunicipalityCode

* Add getVrForMunicipalityCode tests

* Add tests for getVrGmCodesForGmCode

* Add tests for isAbsoluteUrl

* Remove isBrowser

* add .spec to test file

* Add a test step to the Dockerfile

* Add tests for use-unique-id and use-viewport

* Add tests for use-tab-interactive-button and use-throttle

* Start for a test for use-reverse-router

* Add use-reverse-router tests

* Add more use-reverse-router tests

* Add tests for use-previous and use-responsive-container

* Add tests for use-on-click-outside

* Add touch tests

* Add tests for use-media-query

* Add more tests for use-media-query

* Add tests for use-list

* Small additions

* Add tests for use-is-touch-device

* Add link to schema docs

* Update Dockerfile

* Add tests for wrapAroundLength

* Add tests for positiveModulo

* Fix UseIsTouchDevice tests

* Finish up replaceComponentsInText test

* Move shouldForwardProp to lib/

* Add tests for use-is-old-browser

* Start work on useAccessibilityFeatures

* Add tests for use-dynamic-scale and use-is-mounted

* Fix lint errors

* Add tsconfig to icons

Co-authored-by: VWSCoronaDashboard1 <66416946+VWSCoronaDashboard1@users.noreply.github.com>
